title: Amazing Stories Volume 05 Number 04
creator: Sloane, Thomas O'Conor, 1851-1940

description: Amazing Stories, volume 5, number 4 (July 1930). Scanned copy of a pulp magazine published by Experimenter Publications, Inc. and edited by Thomas O'Conor Sloane, Ph.D. Periodical copyright not renewed. Individual contributions' copyrights not renewed. This magazine and its contents are now in the public domain. Featuring: A Visit to Suari (A. Hyatt Verrill), The Driving Power (Miles J. Breuer), Paradox + (Charles Cloukey), Flamingo: A Drama of A.D. 1950 (Clarence Edward Heller), The Message from Space (David M. Speaker), The Universe Wreckers (Edmond Hamilton; 3/3).
